Load and explore RT-DC data

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
PROJ_DIR = "/home/ericbarnhill/Documents/code/R/masscyto_R"
knitr::opts_chunk$set(root.dir = PROJ_DIR)
setwd(PROJ_DIR)
require(gdata,tidyr,dplyr,magrittr)
```

Load and clean data
```{r}
source("load_rtdc.R")
XL_PATH <- file.path(PROJ_DIR, "rt-dc_eb.xls")
rtdc_tall <- load_rtdc(XL_PATH)
```
Explore means of deformation and E with boxplots
```{r}
    plt_e <- rtdc_exploratory_boxplot(rtdc_tall, "mean_e")
    print(plt_e)
    plt_def <- rtdc_exploratory_boxplot(rtdc_tall, "mean_def")
    print(plt_def)
```
